publisher: American Society for Biochemistry & Molecular Biology (ASBMB)
title: Transforming growth factor-β (TGF-β) activates cytosolic phospholipase A2α (cPLA2α)-mediated prostaglandin E2(PGE)2/EP1and peroxisome proliferator-activated-γ (PPAR-γ)/Smad signaling pathways in human liver cancer cells.A NOVEL MECHANISM FOR SUBVERSION OF TGF-β-INDUCED MITOINHIBITION.
